news_header: Mikko Karttila, Legal Director at Alma Media, sold 11,190 shares for EUR 130,923.
news_original_title: Alma Median johtoryhmän jäsen myi osakkeita
news_text: Mikko Karttila, a member of Alma Media's management team, sold a total of 11,190 shares at an average price of EUR 11.7 per share, resulting in a transaction value of EUR 130,923. The shares are part of Alma Media.
